output_list.description: The mintToken function has an integer overflow that allows an attacker to set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value.
The transfer function has an integer overflow that allows an attacker to set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value.
The transferFrom function has an integer overflow that allows an attacker to set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value.
The receiveApproval function has an integer overflow that allows an attacker to set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value.
